snippet: Jean-Georges Vongerichten plans a new food market at ABC Carpet & Home.
abstract: Jean-Georges Vongerichten plans a new food market at ABC Carpet & Home.
lead_paragraph: The New York Post reports that Jean-Georges Vongerichten is planning to add a food market to ABC Carpet & Home, where he already owns ABC Kitchen. Details are sparse, but the chef says he’ll sell local produce, breads, cheeses and snacks. Read more here.

headline.main: ABC and Now D: A Vongerichten Market
